content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully created on the map. In multiple steps the agent attempted to place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but all such attempts failed. No operational building or connected assembly of entities is present as a result of these actions.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage Errors – Calls to get_entities() have been made incorrectly. In one case a keyword ('radius') was passed unexpectedly, and in another call extra positional arguments were provided. Verify the function’s signature and adjust the call to use only the accepted parameters.
• NoneType Handling – Iteration over the result of get_entities() led to a TypeError when a None value was returned. Always check that the fetched entity list is not None (or substitute an empty list) before iterating.
• Lab Placement Issues – Repeated failures to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) are due to the Lab not being present in inventory. Ensure that a Lab is available (or successfully crafted) before attempting its placement.
• Lab Crafting and Resource Shortages – Attempts to craft a Lab have failed because required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) were missing. Verify that the production chain is supplying all necessary components in sufficient quantities before initiating Lab crafting.
